SEARCH
Module com.example.cab302simplestock
Package com.example.cab302simplestock.controller

Class listViewController

java.lang.Object
com.example.cab302simplestock.controller.listViewController
public class listViewController extends Object
Controller class for managing the product details in the list view screen of SimpleStock. It allows users to view, update, or delete existing inventory items.

  • Constructor Details

    • listViewController

      public listViewController()

  • Method Details

    • goBack

      protected void goBack() throws IOException
      Event handler for the "Go Back" button. Navigates back to the search view.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the FXML file for the search view cannot be loaded.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller by setting up the DAO for database interaction. This method is automatically called after the FXML file has been loaded.

    • loadItemById

      public void loadItemById(int itemId)
      Loads an item from the database by its ID and populates the input fields with the item's details.
      Parameters:
      itemId - the ID of the item to load.

    • updateItem

      protected void updateItem() throws IOException
      Event handler for the "Confirm" button. Updates the currently viewed item with the data from the input fields and saves the changes to the database.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error navigating to the previous screen after the update.

    • deleteItem

      protected void deleteItem() throws IOException
      Event handler for the "Delete" button. Deletes the currently viewed item from the database and navigates back to the previous screen.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error navigating to the previous screen after deletion.
